segments.text: I see a scene that’s both heartwarming and worrying all at once.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman stands at the sink, seemingly in her own little world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She’s drying dishes, but the water is overflowing and pooling around her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe she hasn’t noticed the mess forming beneath her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Then I look at the boy, stretching precariously for the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There’s something endearing about his determination, but it terrifies me.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl at his feet looks so hopeful, eagerly waiting to share the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Their innocent mischief contrasts sharply with the adult’s oblivion.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's amusing how they think they can get away with it without being seen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can feel the tension building up, knowing that something will go wrong if no one pays attention.
segments.speaker: PAR
